data.title: Jefferson Mason
data.meta_description: Posts about Jefferson Mason written by giantinthepaint
data.text:
Jefferson Mason & Justin Stommes led the webmoebel Baskets to a 93:81 victory over the Chemnitz 99ers. Stommes had a strong 28 points, 4 steals, 3 assists and shot 5-5 from 3 point range. Jefferson Mason combined 17 points and 8 boards in 24 minutes of playing time. Jorge Schmidt came out strong for Chemnitz with 13 points, 3 rebounds and 2 assists while always hustling and working hard to keep his team in the game.

According to the clubâ€™s website NCAA 2 All-American Jefferson Mason has signed a one-year contract with the german Pro A team webmoebel Paderborn Baskets. The athletic Mason comes from D2 powerhouse Minnesota State-Mankota. Last season he led his Mavericks to the NCAA 2 Final Four semi final game. In the loss Mason scored 24 points and 14 rebounds for his squad. Over the course of the season Mason averaged 19.2ppg, 8.8rpg and 2.2apg on 55,5% shooting from the field.
